entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , North Battleford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:42 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -12.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Battleford Airport 03:50 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -12.1°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -13.4°C
Wind: NW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Fog. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Fog. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 01:44 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Fog dissipating. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Fog dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 01:44 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 01:44 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023
